backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing all frontend source files and their roles in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the copper-themed palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with Intro as root route and defines all page routes.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper hiding nav/footer on the intro page and rendering the site shell.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar linking to major routes with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: A placeholder page that renders nothing.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Displays themed sections describing Brotherhood divisions with images and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Defines and renders multi‑section narrative lore about Texhoma and the Copper Age using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content and feature cards linking to major site sections.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Full‑screen intro with background image and a button that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and detailed card featuring T‑10 armor images and accessories.
frontend/src/pages/PosterPage.tsx: Renders a gallery of poster images inside styled cards with a themed hero section.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Renders a detailed ranks hierarchy page with hero section and multiple rank cards and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Displays armor and uniform variants by rank with structured sections and styled cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, animations, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending requests for the intro landing page update.
